blocks.text:
This guide was developed by NAMI Seattle and uses content from nami.org.  It is based on the Connections resource book originally developed by NAMI Seattle founder Eleanor Owen.

Many people provided invaluable assistance to this project.  NAMI Seattle's Community Resource Coordinator, Gabi Augustamar, oversaw the 2022 revision process, while MSW interns Martina Khurana and Edie Myers-Power contributed many  hours of painstaking editing, research, and rewrites.  We are also grateful to Heidi Smets' outstanding graphic design talents.  In addition, sincere thanks to the following people for their insights and contributions:
